location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 39 of 1833 from David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire, to Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is requesting that a reply to a communication from Ali Ukbar Beg, Ghoolam Peshkhedmut of the Prince of Fars, addressed to the Governor of Bombay is sent to Hyderabad, as that is where Ali Ukbar Beg intends to be.
